Element universal; Type utility (Su); Level 2; Burn 0
Prerequisite samsaran

Once per day, you can accept 1 point of burn to choose one simple blast wild talent belonging to any element. You gain the chosen simple blast wild talent for 1 minute, using your kineticist level – 2 to determine the blast talent’s damage.

The simple blast wild talent you gain in this way does not allow you to meet any prerequisites.
